action.primary: Regulates the Middle Jiao and promotes digestion

indications: Stomach Cold with Qi Stagnation with stomach cramps which are better with warmth and worse with pressure and poor appetite in children
Obstetric and gynecological disorders from Qi and Blood Stagnation with irregular menstruation

action.primary: Opens the channels and collaterals and relieves pain

indications: Soreness and pain in the tendons and bones
Toothache and eye swelling and pain (when combined with Heat-clearing and toxin eliminating herbs)

useCases: Soreness and pain in the tendons and bones
Redness, pain and swelling of the eyes
